resources.string: Please open the floating window first!
Please open the display pop-up window permission to make EastyTouch work properly!
For better functionality, please give EasyTouch BOOT permission!
the screenshot function failed!Please try again!
Your smart phone does not support the flash functionÔºÅ
Note!You can not turn on the camera while using flashlight!Turn off the flashlight before attempting to turn on camera!
Do not give the camera permission,please open the camera permission and then try this feature!
Do not give the read-and-write-file permission,please open the read-and-write-file permission and then try this feature!
The version of your smartphone is too low to use the screenshot function!
Your smart phone does not support Bluetooth devices!
You do not have the ROOT!Please open the ROOT and try screenshot function again!
Screenshot failed! Please check whether the file permissions are turned on and re-open the screenshot function to try again!
Boost done! The system is clean!
Please find EasyTouch in the Management interface and open the "display pop-up window" permission!
Please find EasyTouch in the Management interface and open the "allow boot" permission!
